details:
The last Java security update introduced a change that broke libbluray's
interactive BD-J support. This update adds compatibility with those Java
changes.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
1:1.1.0-1+deb10u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your libbluray packages.


For the detailed security status of libbluray please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/libbluray>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
